name: Desserts
description: Sweet treats to satisfy your sugar cravings. Perfect for ending a meal or enjoying as a snack.

name: Mexican Food
description: Spicy and flavorful dishes, filled with a rich blend of seasonings, meats, and vegetables.

name: Italian Food
description: Delicate dishes made with love, often featuring pasta, cheese, and various sauces.

name: Smoothies
description: Healthy and refreshing drinks made from blended fruits, vegetables, and sometimes dairy or nut milk.

name: Pizza
description: A savory dish of Italian origin, consisting of a flat round base of dough baked with various toppings.
